entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ilasm does not apply multiple custom attributes on interface implementations #82373
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection does not support co- and contravariance #82372
  • Special case the handling of `Extract` followed by `Insert` or `Broadcast` for SIMD #82370
  • More settings for maintaining consistency between AOT and non-AOT mode #82368
    Future
  • Perform simple SIMD transformations where applicable #82366
  • Support recognizing `Blend` as commutative #82365
  • SignedXml cannot validate signature that contain XPath transforms #82363
  • Bitmap text measuring doesn't look accurate and causes last character to be clipped. #82361
  • [API Proposal]: unchecked variants of operator interfaces #82360

Closed

  • Enable using the Parallel.ForEachAsync without a scheduler: invoke the body on the current thread #82359
  • LCIDToLocaleName may return wrong language tag for transient language identifiers #82367
  • More settings for maintaining consistency between AOT and non-AOT mode #82369
  • Unnecessary boxing of value types in System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonValue`1 #82349
  • JIT\opt\ThrowHelper\NonVoidThrowHelper failing with NativeAOT #82030
    8.0.0
  • is possible to use DispatchProxy without interface? #81938
  • Feature request: Make it possible to determine where a CancellationToken was canceled #30713
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • In Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator targets, respect Optimize property. #82374
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Include example diffs in markdown summary #82364
  • [wasm] Remove the EnumCalendarInfo workaround from the pinvoke table … #82362
  • Convert a few more byte[]s to u8s #82358
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers in a few more places #82357
  • Make more progress on IDE0044 ("Make field readonly") #82356

Merged

  • Refactor computing lvaLongVars/lvaFloatVars #82331
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable bigevent test under GCStress #82353
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • Keep side effects in impOptimizeCastClassOrIsInst #82346

Updated

  • JIT: don't optimize calls to CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR for interface class lookups #82209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Revert Allow some intrinsics in Tier0" #82354
  • [mono][wasm] Fix ldftn in AOT mode, it should return a ftndesc. #82282
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix unitialized local in impCastClassOrIsInstToTree #82348
  • #78303 Draft: Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2118310 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix issues with EH in unexecuted loops #82329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix loop hoisting float var profitability calculation #82352
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Combine ExecutionContext/CapturedContext fields in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #82181
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82340
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Model CPU flag dependencies explicitly in LIR #82355
